@ry I modified your test case above and it's OK to run on my machine. I think maybe you should use a MonitoredSession rather than a general Session. https://gist.github.com/abenmao/fdc7205ea55929c8084d9d024421fe5b
Here is the modified test case code. If you can run it ?
